metadata.name: Dawn of Day
metadata.description:
Title: Dawn of Day  
Collection: Lovely Kyrgyzstan  
Creator/Artist: Anne Schmeltzer  
Edition: 1/1

Imagine waking up in a yurt, getting up, going outside and this is what you see.  
You‘re at Song-Kul Lake high up in the mountains of Kyrgyzstan, the sun is rising over the mountain tops on a cool summer morning and free roaming horses are passing by. The light has a soft warm glow to it, you breathe in fresh air. „Dawn of Day“ for me represents the beginning of something new and exciting, a new day, new opportunities, freedom and pure energy.

1/1600 sec  
f/6.3  
ISO 504  
122mm 


6400 x 3600 px

August 2019  
Song-Kul, Kyrgyzstan


License: Primary NFT holder is free to display the NFT privately and in groups, including virtual galleries, as long as the creator is credited. Provides no rights to create commercial merchandise, commercial distribution or derivative works. Copyright remains with the creator.
